items.sentence: This movie was written and directed by Tom Jackson.
If you don\'t eat fast, you\'ll be late for school.
According to the thermometer, it\'s thirty degrees.
I think it\'s time to start helping Tom a bit more.
You do know that Tom and Mary broke up, don\'t you?
You don\'t want to let on how smart you really are.
Tom found out that Mary wasn\'t really from Boston.
Tom says you\'re lying about what time you arrived.
Tom stole the cash that was in Mary\'s desk drawer.
Tom should\'ve let his children go camping with us.
Tom should\'ve told Mary why she needed to do that.
Why don\'t we eat out at a restaurant for a change?
Why don\'t you ever take me with you on your trips?
Why don\'t you tell me a little bit about yourself?
Women don\'t wear dresses as often as they used to.
You must be blind as a bat if you couldn\'t see it.
How can you tell who\'s innocent and who\'s guilty?
I think we shouldn\'t tell Tom about what happened.
I think we\'re going to ask Tom to help us do that.
Tom couldn\'t remember what he had intended to say.
Tom didn\'t even try to pretend that he liked Mary.
Tom didn\'t have enough money to go to the concert.
The police found Tom\'s fingerprint on the trigger.
The police handcuffed Tom\'s hands behind his back.
I forgot to tell Tom that Mary was in the hospital.
I have a toothache and I want to go to the dentist.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary could understand French.
Do you know where I could buy another one of these?
It just won\'t be the same around here without you.
I\'m sorry, but I don\'t feel like going out today.
I\'m not used to dealing with this kind of problem.
I think it\'s time for me to confront that problem.
Tom couldn\'t understand why they all looked alike.
Tom must\'ve had some reason for doing what he did.
Tom was hanged for a murder that he didn\'t commit.
Don\'t plan to eat at Chuck\'s Diner. It\'s closed.
I can\'t help feeling something\'s not quite right.
You should rent a bicycle and ride around the lake.
We were thinking of asking you to join our company.
What do you do to keep yourself from getting bored?
What\'s the difference between football and soccer?
What\'s the first question that comes to your mind?
What\'s the name of the man whose car you borrowed?
What\'s the name of the restaurant where Tom works?
Don\'t count your chickens before they\'re hatched.
Tom and I are often on the same bus in the morning.
Tom and Mary are going to a dance tomorrow evening.
Tom and Mary are going to tie the knot this spring.
Tom should\'ve asked Mary for help, but he didn\'t.
Tom tried to prevent Mary from going to the police.
Tom usually takes a shower before eating breakfast.
Tom very often takes a nap for an hour after lunch.
Tom waited under the tree until it stopped raining.
Tom wanted to spend the rest of his life with Mary.
Tom is that man over there with a long white beard.
Tom is the one who needs to deal with this problem.
Tom is the only one in this group who owns a truck.
Is it true that Tom will go to Australia next year?
I think that what you\'re wearing is inappropriate.
Tom is smarter than any other student in our class.
Tom asked Mary what she had been doing all morning.
Tom and Mary sat there a long time without talking.
Tom and Mary spent three hours discussing the plan.
The movie was actually much better than I expected.
There are fifteen people here, counting the guests.
There are nine girls and three boys in the library.
It\'s supposed to rain every day for the next week.
It\'s unlikely Tom will know what needs to be done.
It\'s very unlikely that Tom acts that way at home.
I thought that Tom was going to Australia with you.
I find it much easier to speak French than English.
I found it difficult to get along with my neighbor.
I can\'t even remember what we were fighting about.
I can\'t relax for a second when the kids are home.
I can\'t remember how to say "thank you" in French.
I can\'t remember the last time I saw you so happy.
My parents were satisfied with my grades this year.
No matter where Tom goes, he has a good reputation.
Tom locked himself in his room and won\'t come out.
They aren\'t children any more, but not adults yet.
Tom could see he wasn\'t going to win the argument.
I didn\'t realize that Tom wouldn\'t be here today.
Tom couldn\'t figure out where the money came from.
Tom couldn\'t forgive Mary for killing his parents.
Tom couldn\'t make himself heard in the noisy club.
I couldn\'t have done anything without Tom\'s help.
I think Tom may be able to do that if you help him.
I think it would be a good idea for you to do that.
I think it would be really good for you to do that.
I think my girlfriend is better looking than yours.
Tom can\'t remember where he bought his pink socks.
You\'re the only one who hasn\'t done what I asked.
Tom said Mary wasn\'t planning on doing that alone.
Tom said he couldn\'t find what he was looking for.
Tom said he didn\'t have the permission to do that.
I think that you should give Tom your phone number.
I don\'t think Tom\'s jokes are particularly funny.
Can you recommend a good place to eat Mexican food?
After Tom ate a little food, his strength returned.
After a while, Tom started to believe his own lies.
